user.title: VR Basestation Setup
user.description: Choose how you want to set up your basestation

automatic.title: Automatic Setup
automatic.description: Enter an optional prefix to identify your basestations. If left empty, devices starting with "{default_prefixes}" will be discovered automatically.

selection.title: Select Device
selection.description: Choose your basestation from the list of discovered devices

manual.title: Manual Setup
manual.description: Enter the MAC address and select the type of your basestation

pair_id.title: Vive Basestation Pair ID
pair_id.description: Enter the pair ID for your Vive basestation "{device_name}". This is required to control V1 basestations.

error.invalid_pair_id: Invalid pair ID format. Enter a valid hexadecimal value (e.g., 1A2B3C4D)
